alert.note: Alert for Saipan; Tinian (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 1:54PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CHST... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHEN...Until 315 PM CHST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 349 AM UTC, Satellite imagery shows heavy rain approaching Tinian and Saipan from the south. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding for Tinian and Saipan. - Rainfall amounts of 2 to 3 inches are expected over Tinian and Saipan. This rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garapan, Dandan, China Town, Tanapag, As Mahetog, Koblerville, San Jose (Tinian Municipality), Chalan Kanoa I, San Antonio, Chalan Kanoa II, Chalan Kanoa III, San Roque, Kagman, Chalan Kanoa IV, Kagman III, Gualo Rai, Afetnas, Chalan Piao, Fananganan and Chalan Laulau. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
